ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: My main s a monk.  All I know is that you can t feign on a horse, which is good enough for me.  I ve never even browsed the prices.  Walking across the desert
ygData.messageBody:
My main's a monk. All I know is that you can't feign
on a horse, which is good enough for me. I've never
even browsed the prices. Walking across the desert
sands suits me fine as long as I can feign.

Quwi Changkane, 61 Grandmaster
Fenin Ro

--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Exactly! I think they should be like portable banks.
> Except they wouldn't do
> coin conversion.
> I also kinda wish the horses and stuff could be like
> the ones in D&D where
> there are different kinds. Ones to carry stuff, ones
> for riding, or ones for
> fighting. And riding could be a skill.
> I really wish they'd lower horse prices... I don't
> want one for prestige. I
> want one that is useful. For the prices horses cost
> they should give you
> +100 to your charisma.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Hey, that's pretty cool! Give a little, get a
> little, I guess, LOL. Oh,
> and
> > I agree... horses and dinosaurs should definitely
> have bags equiped with
> > them, or at least there should be the option to
> buy some that fit on
> them...
> > and they should reduce weight 100%, seeing as you
> are not the one carrying
> > them, LOL.
> >
> > -= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
> >
>
>
